parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value. Make sure that the value is unique among different requests. The token can only contain ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The unit of the subscription duration for the storage plan. Valid values:

*   **Month**
*   **Year**

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description:
The type of the storage plan. Valid values:

*   **Mainland**: The storage plan is used inside the Chinese mainland.
*   **Overseas**: The storage plan is used outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the storage plan.

*   If **Period** is set to **Month**, the value ranges from 1 to 9.
*   If **Period** is set to **Year**, the value can be 1, 2, 3, or 5.
